name: Boosted Marine Life
description:
(under Dev)

This game allows the player to drive down in the super boosted submarine under the depth of the oceans water in order to discover the deepest point where no man have ever gone before! BUT to survive the player need to avoid anything from hitting the submarine! As the submarine goes deeper the pressure increases making the submarine vulnerable to any small creatures. This game allows the player to discover the deeper parts of the oceans first he will see plastic polluted trash normal fish then sharks then whales then the creepy deep sea creatures THEN some SIFI creature that we never discovered
